website_summaries.verdict: A timeless design for men at a lower price than competitors.
pros: So comfortable that you can hardly feel you're wearing them
Medium-sized lenses mean they’re not too large for men with small to medium faces
Double-hinge design gives arms extra stability
cons: May be too dark in some lighting situations

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses TERRIBLE warranty and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these glasses back in 2015. They’re perfect and very elegant yet modern. Last year their finish started peeling I reached out to Electric with pictures and purchase information they never responded to my email or warranty form. Very disappointed since Ive been buying this brand for years. After this, Im moving on to their competing brand. Would not recommend if youre counting on their “warranty”.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but super dark lenses.
customer_reviews.text: I'm loyal to the brand because I've always found that they fit comfortably and look great. I was less than thrilled with the design of these. I wish perhaps I would have gone with something "edgier" than these wayfarer knock offs, but I liked them enough to keep them. The only thing I'll add is that the grey lens is pretty dark and I have to remove them to look at my phone while driving. I think the matte black is pretty cool, and the pouch that doubles as a cleansing cloth is a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: bitboy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on a Woman or a Man.
customer_reviews.text: Really love these shades. I bought myself and my Wubs a pair to replace the pair he lost, had stolen and broke haha. He’s not good with shades! They fit him well and my pair look good even though I’m a women. They are good unisex shades. Great quality. This is my second pair of electrics fav sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Weber

customer_reviews.text: These are excellent sunglasses. They feel sturdy and look great! I can't think of a single thing I don't like about them. When light hits the frame just right, you can see the crimson. Otherwise they appear to be a minimally translucent matte grey. I am very pleased with my purchase and if you're looking for sunglasses in this style that are reasonably priced and well-made, these are the glasses for you!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lavi

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Great price
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying, these are some of the best pair of glasses ive ever purchased. They are comfortable around my head not tight. And they are easy on the eyes. Theyre not super large and i got tons of compliments. Im gonna buy another pair in the near future as backups. And theyre not over priced either lol
customer_reviews.author: Jovane Montes

customer_reviews.title: like a $10 pair from a gift shop
customer_reviews.text: Just picked up a pair of these because my brother in-law has a pair he likes a lot. However, the pair I received feel cheap and fake, like a $10 pair from a gift shop. Maybe I got a bad set but definitely not worth $65, it’s a rip off. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear ray bans (wayfarer). I also usually don't like to buy sunglasses without seeing and touching them first. I'm glad I rolled the dice on these. They fit my face better than wayfarers, and as a bonus, they are high quality. Somewhat lightweight, but not cheap feeling. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great looking glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sunglasses. Very long side arms though, too big to wear. However... I was able to heat the side arms with a lighter and bend them to fit. Ugly yellowish lens color.
customer_reviews.author: pen name!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great sun glasses I love electrics there a great company with great build quality and these don't disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Lexmoew7569

customer_reviews.title: They come packages just as good as Oakley's do
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable I wish they were a little darker but not bad for the price point
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good lenses, bad frame
customer_reviews.text: Lenses are nice and really do cut down on eye strain a lot without being too dark, but the hinges are low quality and the frame is starting to show signs of wear after only a couple of weeks (the matte finish is flaking/rubbing off)
customer_reviews.author: Justin R Vancil

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband like them. They look good. Update: the matthe paint peeled of! They do not lasted long!!
customer_reviews.author: Cibercristie

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses...fit very good...good material...originals brand new...excellent vendor (amazon.com LLC)
customer_reviews.author: Victor R.

customer_reviews.title: These are great..
customer_reviews.text: These are great....I don't know if it's the way they slope in or what it is about standard Wayfarers but they just don't fit my head right...these look great and are an awesome alternative to the classic Ray Ban style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Already got several comments from people that love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses for the price and fit/look great!! will buy more pairs
customer_reviews.author: Just finish

customer_reviews.title: Just one small flaw
customer_reviews.text: I like them I just wish they where polarized. I've see two of the matte black ones start to peel after being used for only a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper B

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The frame matte coating fell off! They look very old even though they have 3 months of using it!
customer_reviews.author: German Luis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its cool fast shipping comfortable to wear I dont have any problems with this so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Real good looking glass Fit true and great quality Would definitely recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I think I've bought 4 pairs in ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I think I've bought 4 pairs in the last 6 months. I love them and so many other people have bought them after wearing mine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glasses are good
customer_reviews.text: I liked the glasses they look dope . And they don't feel as cheap. Gotta get them
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I order. I hope they never discontinue them.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: It would have also been nice if a cleaning cloth and or maybe a Electric ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new(?) Electric sunglasses but the sunglasses weren't wrapped in plastic and that raises concern:/ I mean there in new condition I guess but when your paying and expecting brand new in original packaging that's what you should get and especially in my case what you expect! It would have also been nice if a cleaning cloth and or maybe a Electric sticker, even Spy does this.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Really nice but
customer_reviews.text: Really like these glasses but they have flaked off and are peeling. Makes me wonder if maybe they're nockoffs? I've had plenty of electric glasses and never any issues like this.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

product_meta.title: Electric Swing Arm Wayfarer Sunglasses
product_meta.description:
The Swingarm is lightweight and heavy duty. Purpose built around the innovative double action hinge system, offering uncompromising fit and function.

Electric Visual is a leading manufacturer of sunglasses, goggles, and accessories in the action sports industry. All of their products are tested through their extensive team in the harshest of conditions. All products are made with the highest quality materials on the market. The brand strives to give you products that make you feel good about yourself, and will last the test of time.
feature_bullets: FIT: Medium frame ideal for all face shapes.
OPTICS: 100% UV Protection. 98% Blue Light Protection from Melanin.
TINT:OHM Grey (VLT - 10%) Optimal for daily use in bright sunlight
